messages.subject: Re: WWUD : bIKE hELMETS
messages.msgSnippet: If it weren t for a bicycle helmet, my son would not have a father right now. A bit over a year ago he had a very bad accident. The helmet was very damaged,
messages.messageBody:
If it weren't for a bicycle helmet, my son would not have a father right now.
A bit over a year ago he had a very bad accident. The helmet was very
damaged, and Perry came out of it with a very badly broken collar bone that
kept him off of work (he's a nurse) for a month. But there was no doubt with
the way he fell that he would have been dead or very disabled without the
helmet, according to the doctor.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
